resources.string: An application requires Google Play Services to be enabled.
An application requires installation of Google Play Services.
An application requires an update for Google Play Services.
An application attempted to use a bad version of Google Play Services.
If your device does have a camera, we can\'t find it. Please send feedback with your device model
Your Device Cannot Play This Video
Whoops, we can\'t get that image
The image you selected is stored with a 3rd party service, and we aren\'t able to retrieve it at this time. We\'ll work to support this in the future.
Your Facebook password has changed. Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
This app doesn’t have permission to do this. To change permissions, try logging into the app again.
Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
Your Facebook account is locked. Please log into www.facebook.com to continue.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
Before we get started take a moment to create an OpenWatch account. It only takes a second, and allows you to start broadcasting immediately.
However, we\'ve detected your device has an external application installed that may be able to play this video.
However, there\'s a slim chance an external media player can play this video on your device. Don\'t get your hopes up.
Welcome to OpenWatch. Enter your email to get started.
We weren\'t able to contact FB. Please try again later. I wish there was more we could say...

You can handle the truth! Get @OpenWatch for Android or iOS! 

Android: %1$s 

iOS: %2$s
Please check your username and password. If you do not have an account, please sign up.
The OpenWatch service could not be reached. Please check your network connection and try again.
The email address you provided is not connected to an OpenWatch account. Would you like to register a new account with the following account:
We couldn\'t successfully authenticate your account with Facebook. Sorry!
You must be logged in to view your recordings
Whoops, your account session has expired. Please login again.
You are currently signed in. For security, your password is not stored on this device. Log out to use a different account.
Missions are a way for you to get actively involved in stories that matter to you.
Would you like to remove this tag from this recording?
Your media is live! Spread the word and make an impact!
Your photo is live! Spread the word and make an impact!
Your video is live! Spread the word and make an impact!
This email is already registered with OpenWatch:
There was a probleem signing up. Please try again later.
Are you sure you want to stop recording?
Syncing existing media...\nSync will continue in the background
Unfortunately, your device doesn\'t have native support for this video format.
